rules.rule1: Log a new bird every period.
rules.rule2: You need to see the bird within the period.
rules.rule3: If you haven't seen any new birds when a period comes to it's end, you are out.

about.text1: Game coded by Jonas Myren√•s. Report bugs to

settings.exportHint: Export the streak to CSV format
settings.dataDumpHint: Complete data-dump. Good for debugging if you want to complain to the maker of this app. Add it to a mail to birdstreak@gmail.com
settings.deleteGameHint: You can delete the current game if you want to restart.
settings.alertBody: Are you sure? You can't undo this action afterwards.

startGame.welcome: Welcome to start a streak game. Select a start date and how often you wan to log. Every period is {{formatted}}.
startGame.dateHint: You can start the game on today or a previous date (and backfill your sightings).
startGame.frequencyHint: Select how often you want to report.

logBird.youHave: You have logged {{birdName}} for this period.
logBird.remains: You still have {{hasUnNamedPeriods}} older periods to log!
logBird.whenSingle: When you have locked in on a bird you cannot add a new one until tomorrow.
logBird.whenMultiple: When you have locked in on a bird you cannot add a new one until next period starts.
logBird.nextMultiple: Log next bird before end of {{deadline}}

list.soFar: So far you've locked in {{p}}, over a total of {{duration}}.

deadline.text: Log next bird before end of today!

tooLate.text: You missed to log a new bird in your last period
tooLate.goto2: to reset the game if you want to start a new one.
tooLate.modalHeader: So you want to keep playing?
